summary: Tested and FIXED the 'Edit Assets & Debts' feature on Probate Case Detail page. Found and fixed a critical bug where the frontend was using incorrect Airtable field names ('Name of Asset/Debt' and 'Asset or Debt?' instead of 'Name of Asset' and 'Asset or Debt'). After the fix, all edit functionality works correctly.

issues: Console warning: Missing `Description` or `aria-describedby={undefined}` for {DialogContent} - accessibility improvement recommended

passed_tests: Backend: Login with staff credentials (brittany@illinoisestatelaw.com) - PASS
Backend: PATCH updates Notes field successfully - PASS
Backend: PATCH updates Status field successfully - PASS
Backend: PATCH updates Value field successfully - PASS
Backend: PATCH updates multiple fields at once - PASS
Frontend: Login and navigate to Probate case - PASS
Frontend: Assets & Debts tab displays records (38 records for test case) - PASS
Frontend: Click on asset/debt row opens detail modal - PASS
Frontend: Detail modal shows all asset/debt information correctly - PASS
Frontend: Edit button switches to edit mode - PASS
Frontend: Edit form shows all fields (Name, Asset/Debt type, Status, Value, Type, Notes) - PASS
Frontend: Modify fields and click Save - PASS (after fix)
Frontend: Success toast 'Asset/Debt updated successfully' appears - PASS
Frontend: Changes persist after closing and reopening modal - PASS
Frontend: Sorting logic implemented (Status='Found' first) - PASS (code verified)
critical_code_review_comments: FIXED: Frontend was using incorrect Airtable field names in handleSaveAssetDebt() - changed 'Name of Asset/Debt' to 'Name of Asset' and 'Asset or Debt?' to 'Asset or Debt'
context_for_next_testing_agent: Edit Assets & Debts feature is now fully working. The fix was in /app/frontend/src/pages/ProbateCaseDetail.js lines 546-549 - changed field names from 'Name of Asset/Debt' to 'Name of Asset' and 'Asset or Debt?' to 'Asset or Debt' to match Airtable schema. Test case used: recByWnWVVaPJdpMg (Estate of Peggy Winterhoff) which has 38 assets/debts records. The sorting feature (Status='Found' first) is implemented correctly in the frontend code.
